enhancedPrompt.enhancedPrompt: Generate a vibrant, motivational thumbnail for an educational YouTube video. The main focus should be a dynamically lit, 3D image of an open book with glowing pages, symbolizing knowledge and learning. The book should be positioned on the right side of the thumbnail, leaving space on the left for text. The background should consist of a subtle gradient with abstract, soft-focus light particles to add depth and interest.
enhancedPrompt.styleGuide: The overall style should be modern, clean, and energizing, with a touch of whimsy to make learning appear fun and engaging. The book should be stylized but realistic, with a sense of depth and a soft glow around it for a magical touch. The lighting should be bright and dynamic, with the light source seemingly coming from the book, casting soft shadows on the background.
enhancedPrompt.colorPalette: Use a vibrant but not overpowering color palette. The book should have earthy tones (browns, tans) with the pages glowing in a warm, golden light. The background should use a gradient of soft pastel colors such as light blues and purples, complementing the main subject and making the thumbnail inviting.
enhancedPrompt.composition: The layout should be balanced with the book on the right side, creating a focal point and guiding the viewer's eye towards the text on the left. The text should be in a bold, easy-to-read font, contrasted against the lighter background. Use a rule of thirds grid for placing the book and text to create a harmonious composition suitable for both horizontal (1280x720) and vertical (1080x1920) formats.

promptVariations: Illustrate a vivid, inspiring thumbnail for an instructional YouTube video. The core element is a 3D depiction of a book wide open, its pages emitting a gentle luminescence to signify the power of education. The book must be set on the right-hand section of the thumbnail, leaving room on the left for catchy phrasing. The backdrop should incorporate a smooth gradient coupled with blurry, abstract light orbs for added allure and dimension.

Render a high-energy, empowering thumbnail for a knowledge-focused YouTube video. The centerpiece should be a 3D representation of an open book bathed in dramatic lighting, its pages radiating a soft glow to represent the enlightening nature of learning. The book should sit on the lower right corner of the thumbnail, leaving ample space above and to the left for compelling copy. The background should feature a gentle gradient, punctuated by abstract light flakes subtly out of focus to create a sense of depth and intrigue.

Design an invigorating, motivational thumbnail for an educational YouTube video. The key element should be a 3D model of an opened book under dynamic illumination, with pages that shimmer, symbolizing wisdom and study. Place the book on the right edge of the thumbnail, reserving the left side for impactful text. The backdrop should merge a soft gradient with abstract, defocused light specks to provide an added layer of depth and interest.
